events.text: [color=#ffed29]("We wish to spare you the effort and time of rewriting reports and resubmitting requests, because until [b]Gungandium[/b] is defined we will not approve [b]Remedium[/b].")
[color=#ffed29](I can't believe Mr. Gungand sent the review even knowing that it would be rejected if he didn't tell them what [b]Gungandium[/b] was made of????)
[color=#ffed29](Feels silly thinking that we had a shot of moving onto distribution reading these letters...)
[color=#ffed29]("We wish to spare you the effort and time of rewriting reports and resubmitting requests, because until [b]Gungandium[/b] is defined we will not approve [b]Remedium[/b].")
[color=#ffed29]([b]Gungandium[/b]? Isn't that the compound that Mr. Gungand found that cures people?)
[color=#ffed29](The compound is made by the time it gets to production, so I guess I'm not sure what it's made of, either.)
